description: Manage a Managed Instance's Azure Active Directory only settings.

commands.name: az sql mi ad-only-auth disable
commands.summary: Disable Azure Active Directory only Authentication for this Managed Instance.
examples: az sql mi ad-only-auth disable --resource-group mygroup --name myMI

commands.name: az sql mi ad-only-auth enable
commands.summary: Enable Azure Active Directory only Authentication for this Managed Instance.
examples: az sql mi ad-only-auth enable --resource-group mygroup --name myMI

commands.name: az sql mi ad-only-auth get
commands.summary: Get a specific Azure Active Directory only Authentication property.
examples: az sql mi ad-only-auth get --resource-group mygroup --name myMI
